snippet: Rookie quarterbacks in the N.F.L. are having rapid success, perhaps because they come prepared having played a level of college football that now closely resembles the professional game.
abstract: NFL Fast Forward; many rookie quarterbacks in the NFL are having rapid success, perhaps because they come prepared having played a level of college football that now closely resembles the professional game.
lead_paragraph: Rookie quarterbacks in the N.F.L. are having rapid success, perhaps because they come prepared having played a level of college football that now closely resembles the professional game.

headline.seo: Class of Rookie Quarterbacks Fascinates League
headline.main: For Rookies, It’s Ready, Set, Throw
headline.print_headline: For Rookies, It’s Ready, Set, Throw
